#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int n,i;
bool flag=false;
cin>>n;
char arr[n+1];
cin>>arr;
double a,f,sum=0;
cin>>a>>f;
i=1;
sum=a;
while(i<n)
{
if(arr[i-1]==arr[i])
sum+=a;
else
sum-=a;
if(sum>=f)
{
flag=true;
break;
}
i++;
}
if(flag)
cout<<"NO"<<endl;
else
cout<<"YES"<<endl;
return 0;
}
